text: M. J. Radhakrishnan (1957/1958 â€“ 12 July 2019) was an Indian cinematographer. He worked in Malayalam movies. He was born in Punalur, Kollam. His best known works included Deshadanam, Karunam and Naalu Pennungal. Radhakrishnan died on 12 July 2019 from cardiac arrest at a hospital in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Indian cinematographers
title: M. J. Radhakrishnan
